data.title: Contacts for UK Congenital Cardiac Centres – Children's Heart Association
data.text:
The following is a list of congenital cardiac centres in the UK, along with contact numbers and liaison nurses.

Alder Hey Children’s Hospital, Liverpool

Cardiac Number: 0151 252 5291

Gill McBurney

Helen Walker

Mary Murray

Amanda Howarth

Royal Manchester Children’s Hospital

Cardiac Number: 0161 701 0664 / 0665 Please leave a message.

Clair Noctor

Letitia Cooper

Laura Jole

Liverpool Heart and Chest Hospital (Adults and Teens)

Helpline for all North West adult congenital queries 0151 254 3333. Please leave a message. The team will call you back as soon as possible.

The team are now based at LHCH but hold appointments across the NW so if you were previously seen in Manchester and this is your closest hospital you might not notice a change in the service.
